DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: SANTOS, D. E. S.;SANTOS, DENYS EWERTON DA SILVA;SANTOS, DENYS E. S.;SANTOS, DENYS;SILVA SANTOS, DENYS EWERTON;SANTOS, DENYS E.S.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Engenheiro Qumico (2016) e Mestre e Doutor em Qumica (2017, 2021) pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, UFPE. Tem experincia na rea de Qumica, com nfase em Qumica Computacional. Trabalhou desde 2012 em atividades relacionadas a simulao de peptdeos antimicrobianos e sua interao com membranas bacterianas (P. aeruginosa), simulao de Polymer Brushes e sua interao com molculas de DNA para entendimento do processo de DNA delivery e desenvolvimento de pacotes computacionais de anlise de superfcies biolgica.Atualmente Denys o coordenador do Laboratrio de Modelagem Molecular e Mtodos Computacionais Avanados, onde dirige pesquisas na rea de Qumica Terica aplicada a processos de Drug Design, Drug Delivery, desenvolvimento de algoritmos computacionais e simulaes de interfaces qumicas biolgicas, orgnicas e inorgnicas.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Chemical Engineer (2016) and Master and Doctor in Chemistry (2017, 2021) from the Federal University of Pernambuco, UFPE. He has experience in the field of Chemistry, with an emphasis on Computational Chemistry. Since 2012, he has worked on activities related to the simulation of antimicrobial peptides and their interaction with bacterial membranes (P. aeruginosa), simulation of Polymer Brushes and their interaction with DNA molecules to understand the DNA delivery process and development of computational packages for surface analysis biological.Denys is currently the coordinator of the Laboratory of Molecular Modeling and Advanced Computational Methods, where he directs research in the area of Theoretical Chemistry applied to Drug Design, Drug Delivery processes, development of computational algorithms and simulations of biological, organic and inorganic chemical interfaces.
